alert.note: Alert for Centennial Mountains, Island Park (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Avalanche Warning issued March 15 at 5:49AM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center in Bozeman has CONTINUED an AVALANCHE WARNING which is in effect until 6 AM MDT Thursday... * WHAT..The Gallatin National Forest Avalanche Center has continued an avalanche warning. The avalanche danger is HIGH on all slopes. Natural and human-triggered slides are very likely. * WHERE...The Centennial Mountains in Island Park. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...A large amount of new snow with strong winds are creating unstable conditions over a wide area. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Very dangerous avalanche conditions exist. Backcountry travelers should stay off of steep slopes and stay away from the bottom of steep slopes. Avalanches can be triggered from flat terrain. Steep slopes can avalanche far above and run into lower-angled terrain. Go to www.mtavalanche.com/forecast/centennials for more detailed information. Consult www.mtavalanche.com or www.avalanche.org for more detailed information. Similar avalanche danger may exist at locations outside the coverage area of this or any avalanche center.
